DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample urine patient cancer laboratory may help doctor identify biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study biomarkers urine patient Wilms tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Biomarkers Urine Samples From Patients With Wilms Tumor
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To validate prognostic performance specific-candidate Wilms tumor marker measure urinary concentration use enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay ( ELISAs ) urine specimen collect diagnosis 50 patient favorable histology Wilms tumor relapse 50 patient relapse . OUTLINE : Urine specimens analyze use enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay ( ELISAs ) biomarkers .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Urine specimen collect diagnosis select patient stage IIIII Wilms tumor , local nonlocal site disease relapse Clinical patient information ( urinalysis/macro , age , gender , congenital defects/syndromes , comorbidities , tumor stage , size , pathology , therapy , outcome ) available PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
DOC.keyword: recurrent Wilms tumor childhood kidney tumor
